segments.text: Yes , I ’ m off to the department store . I must buy some furniture for my new flat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Well you ’ ll have to get there before 6pm because they close early today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah and remember if you buy something you mustn ’ t carry it home otherwise your back will get worse .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , do they have a delivery service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but it ’ s not free , you have to pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I ’ ll see you later .
segments.speaker: S2
